story.book

Class SimpleWarningDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.SimpleWarningDialog

  • public class SimpleWarningDialog
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a facade for creating a simple warning dialog with title, message, and a confirmation button.
    Author:
    Nancy Pham-Nguyen, Vina Nguyen Reference: http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/dialogs.html

    • Constructor Summary

      SimpleWarningDialog() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void getWarningDialog(java.lang.String message, Context context)
      Creating a simple warning dialog with generic title, the supplied message, and a confirmation button.
